hero.title: Elevate Your Entertainment with MoonPlay
hero.description: The all-in-one IPTV platform offering access to premium live TV, sports, movies, and series — anytime, anywhere. Cut the cords and enjoy world-class entertainment.

logos.title: Channels and platforms available on MoonPlay IPTV

features.title: Everything You Need for Non-Stop Streaming
features.description: MoonPlay delivers the ultimate streaming experience — crystal-clear quality, global channels, and 24/7 support. Here's why users love it:

instantSetup.title: Instant Setup
instantSetup.description: Start watching in minutes with easy activation and device pairing.

hdQuality.title: HD & 4K Quality
hdQuality.description: Enjoy ultra-clear streaming in HD and 4K across all supported content.

worldwideChannels.title: Worldwide Channels
worldwideChannels.description: Access live TV, sports, and entertainment from across the globe.

secureStreaming.title: Secure Streaming
secureStreaming.description: Your connection is protected with encrypted and private streaming.

multiDevice.title: Multi-Device Access
multiDevice.description: Watch on Smart TVs, phones, tablets, or laptops — anytime, anywhere.

support.title: 24/7 Customer Support
support.description: Our support team is here to assist you at any time, day or night.

howItWorks.title: Simple Start, Endless Entertainment
howItWorks.description: Get started in minutes and experience the difference MoonPlay brings to your entertainment.

contact.title: Contact Us to Get Started
contact.description: Reach out to us via WhatsApp or email to choose your plan and receive your activation code.

activate.title: Activate Your Subscription
activate.description: Use your code to activate MoonPlay on your preferred device — Smart TV, phone, tablet, or laptop.

watch.title: Start Watching Instantly
watch.description: Enjoy non-stop entertainment with live sports, movies, and TV from all over the world.

testimonials.title: Loved by Teams Worldwide
testimonials.description: Don't just take our word for it. See what our customers have to say about their experience.

items.quote: MoonPlay كانت مذهلة معنا. هناك الكثير من القنوات وبجودة HD! لم أعد أحتاج إلى الساتلايت.
items.author: كريم العمراني

items.quote: صديقي عرفني على MoonPlay، ومنذ أن جربته أصبحت مدمنًا عليه! دوري الأبطال، نتفليكس، كل شيء في مكان واحد.
items.author: ياسين ب.

items.quote: فريق MoonPlay يرد عليك فورًا إذا كان عندك أي مشكل. خدمة الزبناء عندهم ممتازة.
items.author: أمينة الزهراوي

items.quote: جربت IPTV آخر من قبل، لكن MoonPlay في مستوى آخر. موثوق وسهل التثبيت.
items.author: إيمان ك.

items.quote: عندهم قنوات رياضية، مسلسلات، كرتون... ولدي يحبها كثيرًا وتوفر لنا محتوى رائع في المنزل.
items.author: محمد ل.

items.quote: التركيب كان سريع وما انتظرتش. عطاوني كود، وفي 5 دقايق بديت نتفرج.
items.author: سكينة ح.

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.description: Choose the plan that's right for your business. All plans include a 14-day free trial.

plans.name: Basic
plans.description: Essential streaming with live channels and movie collection for basic entertainment.

plans.name: VIP
plans.description: Enhanced experience with expanded channel selection and premium content library.
features: Secondary account provided in case of site outage

plans.name: Premium
plans.description: Full access to global sports and entertainment with top-tier performance.
features: Secondary account provided in case of site outage

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about our platform.

questions.question: What is MoonPlay IPTV?
questions.answer: MoonPlay IPTV is a premium streaming service that provides access to thousands of live TV channels, movies, and shows from around the world. Our service offers high-quality streaming with reliable servers and 24/7 customer support.

questions.question: How many channels do you offer?
questions.answer: We offer over 10,000 live TV channels from various countries and regions, including sports, news, entertainment, documentaries, and kids' content. Our channel list is constantly updated with new additions.

questions.question: What devices are supported?
questions.answer: MoonPlay IPTV is compatible with Smart TVs, Android devices, iOS devices, Windows, macOS, Amazon FireStick, Android TV boxes, MAG boxes, and more. We provide easy setup guides for all supported devices.

questions.question: Is there a free trial available?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer a 24-hour free trial for new customers. This allows you to test our service quality, channel selection, and streaming performance before making a purchase decision.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept various payment methods including PayPal, credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), cryptocurrency, and other secure payment gateways for your convenience.

questions.question: How quickly will I receive my login details?
questions.answer: Your login credentials will be delivered to your email within 5-30 minutes after payment confirmation. Our automated system ensures quick activation of your subscription.

cta.title: Ready to Unlock Non-Stop Entertainment?
cta.description: Join thousands of viewers enjoying over 3000 live channels and on-demand content. With MoonPlay, you're always just a click away from premium entertainment.
cta.subtitle: Instant activation. No contracts. Stream anywhere, anytime.

footer.description: Stream smarter with MoonPlay — over 3000 channels, one powerful IPTV platform, endless entertainment.
